name: Accounting Office
description: Julie's domain. Walls covered in marathon medals and financial charts. The smell of protein shakes and spreadsheets fills the air. A treadmill desk sits in the corner.

mudText.examine: A modern office with dual monitors showing real-time financial dashboards. Marathon bibs from Boston, NYC, and Chicago are framed on the wall. A blender sits next to the coffee maker (unused). Julie's running shoes are under the desk, ready for her lunch run.
mudText.enter: You enter the Accounting Office. Julie is at her standing desk, sipping a green smoothie while reviewing Stripe transactions. Her fitness tracker beeps. 'Just hit 10K steps!' she says without looking up.
